attributes.action: STOP Alcohol Sales To Victims Of Alcohol Abuse / Street Drinkers / Intoxicated & START Offering Support At Point Of Sales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Street drinkers and victims of alcohol abuse are being served alcohol and DYING from alcohol abuse or alcohol related illnesses and sales of alcohol in the community should have a watchdog and service offering support to these businesses and also support to the victims of alcohol abuse with support cards of alcohol support in their area. If these businesses are taking the money and serving these victims of alcohol abuse , they should then offer support when they have a problem with alcohol
